com.guidewire.ab.external.entity

Interface Role

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DecentralizedEntity, Editable, gw.pl.external.entity.Entity, EventAware, gw.pl.external.entity.KeyableEntity, Retireable, Versionable
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface Role
extends DecentralizedEntity, EventAware, Retireable, gw.pl.external.entity.Entity
    A set of permissions defining a user Role. A User can be given multiple Roles and will be granted the union of all their Role permission sets.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      Utility class for initializing an instance of Role
      static class  Role.UTIL
      Deprecated. 
      Utility class for accessing static features for Role Access static properties for this type.
